channel.title: Need help with Silab Client - Reward
channel.description:
Ok. I download Silabs Client. I try to open client.jar, nothing happens, so I go and try to open run.bat and it comes up with this message:
C:\Documents and Settings\Dawn\My Documents>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 Unable to access jarfile client.jar
C:\Documents and Settings\Dawn\My Documents>pause Press any key to continue . . .
Im not sure what im doing thats wrong :confused:
When this problem is fixed you will be rewarded.

item.title: Need help with Silab Client - Reward
item.dc:creator: @AutoFighter_Ltd AutoFighter Ltd
item.description:
@AutoFighter_Ltd wrote:

Ooh! thanks for reping me thank you alot. i did post this guide and no one said don’t it’s rubbish much aprecciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Silab Client - Reward
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

[quote=“chipmunk man, post:10, topic:146332”]I’m not gonna help you.
Why?

Double posted.
No giving out rewards or selling on these forums.
With the exception of scar script[/quote]

  1. Stop trying to get moderator.
  2. It will NEVER HAPPEN!!
    3.Shut up please.
    4.If you dont like me then LEAVE RIGHT AT THIS VERY MOMENT.
  3. I said i would check back. cya[br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2007, 11:21:58 AM[/size][hr][quote=“AutoFighter Ltd, post:11, topic:146332”]PS: i copied and pasted this guide from my own FAQ for Silabs client Please read.

Alright , i know some of you always get the error ’ laoderror: error unpack config 86’. Well now this guide will help you with silabs client. All right, first you need to download it.

Silab’s Client’s( please copy and paste if auto click does not work)
http://dnd.no-ip.org/version3.rar
http://dnd.no-ip.org/version3.zip

And you will also need the latest JDK 6
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Right, now we have done. So if you had made a shortcut to your desktop it should be easier.

I know some of you have already got alll of this and it says ’ error loadpack config 86’ blah blah blah.

First, extract the whole folder( SIlba’s client). Now, if you have your Firewall enabled please turn it off.

Now, Load it up ( Silabs Client); and wait for it to load. As you notice, the Command Screen will not say ’ LoadError: error unpack config 86’, but it should say something like’Silabsoft Customed Cache’ underneath the rs2 user client- realease 31?

Now if you should see the ‘Jagex’ client screen working and it says ‘existing user’. Now, just login and play a server compatible with Silab’s Client.

Enjoy!

If this does not work, please pm and i will try to awnser your questions.

I hope this works,

Regards

                  AutoFighter Ltd[/quote]

Thanks a whole lot! i got it 2 work! thanks sooo much!

P.S. check your karma

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Silab Client - Reward

item.title: Need help with Silab Client - Reward
item.dc:creator: @AutoFighter_Ltd AutoFighter Ltd
item.description:
@AutoFighter_Ltd wrote:

PS: i copied and pasted this guide from my own FAQ for Silabs client Please read.

Alright , i know some of you always get the error ’ laoderror: error unpack config 86’. Well now this guide will help you with silabs client. All right, first you need to download it.

Silab’s Client’s( please copy and paste if auto click does not work)
http://dnd.no-ip.org/version3.rar
http://dnd.no-ip.org/version3.zip

And you will also need the latest JDK 6
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Right, now we have done. So if you had made a shortcut to your desktop it should be easier.

I know some of you have already got alll of this and it says ’ error loadpack config 86’ blah blah blah.

First, extract the whole folder( SIlba’s client). Now, if you have your Firewall enabled please turn it off.

Now, Load it up ( Silabs Client); and wait for it to load. As you notice, the Command Screen will not say ’ LoadError: error unpack config 86’, but it should say something like’Silabsoft Customed Cache’ underneath the rs2 user client- realease 31?

Now if you should see the ‘Jagex’ client screen working and it says ‘existing user’. Now, just login and play a server compatible with Silab’s Client.

Enjoy!

If this does not work, please pm and i will try to awnser your questions.

I hope this works,

Regards

                  AutoFighter Ltd

Read full topic

item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

No lol, they need to be in the same folder because the run.bat is supposed to run the client.jar.

o.O ooh… I changed the variables and all ill try it now.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2007, 11:13:09 AM[/size][hr]Its just not working. Could you send me your client or something that will help me. Directions from the start? Anything? By the way thanks for helping me

item.title: Need help with Silab Client - Reward
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:6, topic:146332”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=200342.msg1780099#msg1780099 date=1190756736]
You must have client.jar in the same folder as the run.bat.
[/quote]

When you download silabs client, it doesn’t come in a folder, and it just needs to be on the same area, like Desktop, or Documents.

Is that a problem? And yes I do ;D

Paths?.. Or, try saving it to a different area.[/quote]

Thanks but I really need your help right now. I put Client.jar into a new folder without run.bat and it didnt do anything. ill try to read the Silab Client FAQ thingy and check back. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Silab Client - Reward
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

You must have client.jar in the same folder as the run.bat.

When you download silabs client, it doesn’t come in a folder, and it just needs to be on the same area, like Desktop, or Documents.

MasterHelper:

Is that a problem? And yes I do ;D

Paths?.. Or, try saving it to a different area.
